Steps.StepString: Browsed the application's pages and observed the data displayed for each user.
Noticed a pattern in the data's structure and IDs.
Crafted a URL containing the ID of another user, e.g. http://example.com/user?id=2, and submitted it to the application.
Verified the presence of an IDOR vulnerability by submitting the crafted URL to the application.
Identified a privileged user with the required sensitive data.
Crafted a suitable URL containing the ID of the privileged user and submitted it to the application.
Obtained the flag for the Web Exploitation challenge from the displayed sensitive data of the privileged user.
